detectors.description:
AntBptRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#669-684) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#675)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#678)
detectors.markdown:
[AntBptRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#L669-L684) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#L675)
	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#L678)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in AntBptRewards.exit() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#655-658):
	External calls:
	- withdraw(balanceOf(msg.sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#656)
		- bpt.safeTransfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#586)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#517)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#657)
		- rewardToken.safeTransfer(msg.sender,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#664)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#517)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#657)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#608)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#657)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#607)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#657)
		- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#663)
		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#610)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#657)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AntBptRewards.sol#611)
